name: ClickWall
tag_list: social, gaming, games, facebook, cross-promotion, promotion, acquisition, mau, dau, arpu, developers, exit-traffic, performance, monetization, players, social-gaming, casual-games, exchange-network, online-game, apps, click-exchange, traffic-exchange, net
overview:
It’s All About Earning

ClickWall is the next generation in performance based cross-promotion for quality Social, Web and Mobile games like yours.

The network was created with your needs in mind and it will help deliver the traffic your game needs to be successful. Whether your game is large or small, ClickWall offers a solution to help you grow the way you choose.

Better Targeting- Successful games begin with the right players. We have gone way beyond the standard offer of global and category targeting to incorporate pinpoint targeting as well.

Higher Quality- Don’t just trade clicks. We give you the tools to constantly measure what works for your game and increase the quality of your traffic with each step.

Better Retention- . Unlike other cross promotional networks our tools are specifically geared towards locking players in, increasing the value of each acquisition.

Share with Mobile- Now that your FB app is all grown up, it’s time to share players with your mobile app. With our unique “Facebook-to-Mobile” conversion tool, you can be on their screen and in their pocket.

Re-Targeting, Re-Marketing- ClickWall is the first click exchange network to offer powerful re-targeting and re-marketing tools (don’t break the word re-marketing). Chase the players who contribute the most to your business and don’t let them go away!

Best Neighborhood As gamers at heart, we only accept games we love playing ourselves. Rest assured your game is in good company and your incoming traffic of the highest quality.

Smarter Engine Powered by the most advanced reporting system on the market, our system is constantly optimizing your campaigns and ads to guarantee top performance.

Higher CTR- With ClickWall your CTR will look better than ever. Say goodbye to 0.003%…..

Personalized Service- Our success depends directly on yours. We will provide you the best level of service possible and are willing to help with absolutely anything you may need to grow your game.

More Flexibility We’re open to a variety of business models including CPI and revenue share agreements. If you’ve got an idea for a cool, new, creative partnership - we’re all ears.

Bigger Payouts- The ClickWall system is totally free which means we put more cash in your pocket!

SPECIAL FEATURE:

Exit Traffic- Leverage the users that are leaving your game to receive fresh qualified paying users. With full control of the users and the events in which the Clickwall Exit Traffic offer will display, you will witness a dramatic effect on your business

Reach up to 30% CTR and get ready for an influx of fresh traffic!

By working with us you’ll be able to get back to doing what you do best - Developing great games!

video_embeds.description: Introducing ClickWall - A Performance Based Cross Promotion Network
